scripts.codegen: truffle exec render-templates.js && graph codegen && npm run fix-schema.ts
scripts.codegen:mainnet: tnt iN && truffle exec --network=mainnet render-templates.js && graph codegen && npm run fix-schema.ts
scripts.bootstrap-test: wait-on tcp:8545 && npm run migrate && wait-on http-get://localhost:8000 && npm run create-local
scripts.test-fresh-graph: npm run codegen && wait-on tcp:5001 && npm run deploy-local && npm run test-existing-graph
scripts.test: npm run bootstrap-test && npm run test-fresh-graph
scripts.publish-graph:mainnet: npm run codegen:mainnet && npm run deploy:mainnet
